name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth WORRELL. Appeal of Nino V. TINARI, Esq.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth WORRELL. Appeal of Nino V. TINARI, Esq.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Nino V. Tinari, pro se, Vincent P. DiFabio, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 741
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kenneth WORRELL. Appeal of Nino V. TINARI, Esq.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Nino V. Tinari, pro se, Vincent P. DiFabio, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
